mapper.select: select fm.id,fm.create_time,fm.user_id,fm.address,fm.reply_user_id,fm.content,ui.nickname,ui.avatar from b_forum_comment fm left join b_user u on fm.user_id=u.id left join b_user_info ui on ui.id=u.user_info_id where fm.forum_id = #{forumId} and fm.parent_id is null order by fm.create_time desc
